website_summaries.verdict: A steal for parents who prefer to make their own baby food and need an easy-to-use storage container.
pros: Stackable silicone tray with a lid
Easy to remove food from the tray
cons: A few have said the lid doesn't stay on well in the freezer

customer_reviews.title: Please buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the horrible smell was from washing the trays with Dr. Bronner's soap, but then I realized the trays themselves smell terrible! I am so angry that I used these to freeze my baby's food because who knows what it is tainted with. Please take warning from my and other reviews complaining of a bad smell. Go with a different tray. Returning mine for a refund. Too bad all of that baby food will now go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: It’s true, they smell so bad
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree 100% with other reviews and I had to give these one star because 2 years later and the smell of these are the exact same.....disgusting. I thought with my second child that they would’ve aired out by now (2 yrs later) but nope. They retain any odor it comes in contact with as well. It’s a hot mess of horrible smells. Something just isn’t right with them. Wish I could suggest different ones but those are the only ones I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Destroyess

customer_reviews.title: Product is not Durable and tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I purchased 2 of them. This is my first time using the product for baby food and noticed a green particle in one of my baby’s sweet potato cube and on inspecting the cube maker noticed the tear. I even put this in room temp water before removing the baby food. So as to loosen the sides. These were gently hand washed and air dried. Therefore can only come to the conclusion that this product is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Franco

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are silicone and have a lid but the lid doesn't stay on very well and are not very secure. After making the baby food and putting it in the tray, the lid seems secure enough...but once the food has frozen and I'm popping the cubes out as I need them, the lid is hard to secure back on. If I were to invert the trays, I bet the lids would fall right off. I guess you get what you pay for, $6 as compared to the $15 trays out there.
customer_reviews.author: Elle D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These containers are easy to use, clean, and store. The only thing I really didn't like is the lid doesn't stay on well. However, its a small defect that doesn't take away from its usability. Just have to remember when moving the tray around or it will fall off. Bought three and found they are easily stackable when storing away. In the freezer or fridge I would set the bottom one on a small plate for a sturdy base. The cubes are very flexible and the food pops out easily. We've come a long way from making food in ice cube trays back when I had my first baby! This is a must have for homemade food prep.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these for over 2 years and just ordered a 3rd (with the addition of a child in our family). They hold up very well and just throw in the dishwasher to clean. I make any purée, freeze, then put in freezer safe bag to store. They can by slightly difficult to release the food from the mold, but I just run a knife along the sides and then shimmy it out.
customer_reviews.author: ATRW0910

customer_reviews.title: I dunno. Not as good as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.text: Like I saw in another review, this container started to smell horribly after just a couple uses. I washed thoroughly each time but it still smelled rancid. At first I thought it was just that awkward freezer smell but after soaking, washing, and sterilizing, it still smelled terrible. Additionally, the functionality of the lid connecting to the tray is a little off. A lot of times it will just pop off even if I have the ridges tucked in just so. If I didn't keep food frozen in a cross pattern where the connecting ridges were, it was even more difficult. Great idea but really bummed me out for my first try at freezer storing baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great size, 1 or 2 oz portions
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make and freeze homemade baby food. This is a great product! It is easy to fill, and the larger shape allows for one or two-ounce portions (most other trays only allow for one ounce). They are stackable, so they don't take up much freezer space. A quick run under the faucet loosens them up to remove one at a time- great for when that's all you need, but a little time consuming to completely empty. Still a convenient product though- would buy again! I also use this to transport food when we are traveling- I have one trey for breakfast food, lunch, and supper!
customer_reviews.author: B B

customer_reviews.title: I really like that they are flexible rubber I got these to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these to freeze meat juices for my dogs. I really like that they are flexible rubber I got these to freeze meat juices for my dogs. They work very well. I love that it is so flexible and easy to remove the cubes. The only con is that it is a little difficult to put the lid on and you have to be careful when putting in the freezer, as the top pops off, but that's a small price to pay for the convenience of flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cat

customer_reviews.title: I may have gotten a bad stock as I didn't see this with other feedbacks
customer_reviews.text: I've used and washed mine several times now but there is still this lingering smell of the silicone that makes me nauseous. I wish I returned it the first time I got it if I knew it won't go away. I may have gotten a bad stock as I didn't see this with other feedbacks. I would have loved it if it weren't for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jels

customer_reviews.title: Description a bit inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something in which to freeze tomato paste in portions of 2 tablespoons. This is listed as having nine one ounce cups. They are actually two ounce, which is 4 tablespoons, larger than I wanted but I think they will do. I also think the square cups will be harder to clean than round. Some of us like precision and would appreciate accurate descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT silicone tray, but lid doesn't stay on well.
customer_reviews.text: The silicone tray is GREAT and perfectly sized for freezing my own baby food! My only complaint comes with the cover -- it is hard to keep it on the tray, especially when you have frozen cubes of food in there, and are trying to replace the lid. It just kind of sits there, but isn't a tight seal, and sometimes comes off in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Minnemama2017

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade baby food
customer_reviews.text: I typically use ice cube trays to freeze my homemade purees but wanted to try something different. I really like this tray, the portion sizes are good and the silicone is super soft so the frozen food comes out really easily. The only thing is that I'd recommend buying a couple, one doesn't hold a whole lot (maybe one sweet potato if you are lucky).
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Juice Pops too!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to make homemade baby food and it worked rather well. Since my little one was not a fan of purees my other daughter claimed it to make homemade juice pops. This container if great for the pops and makes it super easy to get them out. When I used it for baby food there was never an issue getting it out either. I love that its do flexible and you can just pop out whatever you have in them. I would buy again since it serves multiple uses in out home.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: 2oz portion silicone baby food container
customer_reviews.text: Pros: quality grade silicone. Cap is sturdy and not soft silicone that's hard to cap, easy to clean Cons: portion size is 2 ounces, not 1. If you fill it all the way it's hard to pop out because the dividers are rigid and not separated But if you don't fill all the way, it will pop out easy and flip inside out
customer_reviews.author: Chloe O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it. When I take it out of the freezer I let it set about 3 minutes at room temperature and the food slides right out. Only down side is that it would be nice if it had a line to indicate where to fill it. I just estimate it but would definitely be nice to have some sort of guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Estrella

customer_reviews.title: But these if you’re making your own baby food!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy to fill, easy to put in the freezer and most importantly, so easy to get the frozen purées out! Super easy to clean and they stack if you buy more than one tray, taking up hardly any space when you’re not using them. If you’re making your own baby food, definitely buy these!
customer_reviews.author: cck573

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, I was concerned before buying this product based on some of the other reviews about the smell. There are lots of reviews saying this has an intense smell. When I received the tray, it did have an odor. However, I just washed it in my dishwasher as soon as I got it & the smell went away! I've used it to freeze baby food & the odor has not returned. This is a great product. The frozen baby food was easy to remove & this tray is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much I bought more. Perfect for those who make homemade baby food and I can see how they will serve a purpose for popsicle as my little one gets older. I was using ice trays since I’m a frugal person; however ice trays would crack and break since I used them so much. They are durable and it’s so easy to push the cube out due to the flexible material. One cube is the perfect serving size for my 7month old. Highly recommended this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bucalo

customer_reviews.title: Best baby food freezing tray!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for making baby food! There work well for all different textures from watery strawberries to thick sweet potatoes. The cubes easily pop out from the container. I also like that the lid on this container actually snaps down. Other ones I tried it was like a rubber sheet going across the top, and it wouldn’t stay down. This kid stays down allowing for easy stacking in the freezer! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Mingledorff

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making homemade baby food. I wanted to know what was in my babies food so I bought these to make & freeze baby food. Super easy to use & super easy to take out.
customer_reviews.author: V Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: ... baby's food homemade and this tray makes it so easy! Some reviewers mentioned the lid doesn't seal tight- ...
customer_reviews.text: I make all of my baby's food homemade and this tray makes it so easy! Some reviewers mentioned the lid doesn't seal tight- because the idea is just to freeze the food solid, then take it out and store in an airtight container like a ziploc freezer bag! I only bought one and wish I had a second one, if I have another baby I will definitely get another one.
customer_reviews.author: richa521

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this for making your own food. It is very convenient and easy to use. The soft silicone makes it easy to pop out the Frozen portions. The only adjustment I made was putting Saran Wrap across the top prior to putting the lid on to keep the freezer burn out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It smells like chemicals. I don't feel comfortable putting baby food ...
customer_reviews.text: It smells like chemicals. I don't feel comfortable putting baby food in it. I wish I had listened to the other reviewers who complained of the same thing. I did not think the smell would be so bad and so strong even after several washing.
customer_reviews.author: gfitz246

customer_reviews.title: easy 2oz breastmilk portions
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to freeze breastmilk for a small stash. We are currently feeding breastmilk and supplementing with formula and the 2oz cubes make it easy to freeze small portions for when I go back to work so baby still has some breast milk in his diet. I only wish the tray had some indicator on the cubes for the 2oz mark.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I was worried it would be difficult to remove portions after freezing, but not an issue. They slide right out with a slight push. The silicone is flexible, making it easy to push food out. It’s durable, I’ve had it for months, and after plenty of uses still holding up like new. Cleaning is easy, since everything essentially slides out, it’s just a a quick sponge down in each slot. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: masa7162

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They come with a top to protect the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They come with a top to protect the food and they are a decent size. The cubes are easy to take out once they are frozen too. It makes my life at lot easier to make my own food using this. And cheaper too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fran

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it. Chemical smell. Do not close airtight
customer_reviews.text: The trays had strong chemical smell after one use, and the baby food had freezer burn (the tray do not close airtight). I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I have ever bought. Had strong chemical smell. Throw away . How can they make it to contain baby food????????DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruoqing Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome freezer form
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this freezer form for baby food. I ended up getting 3 more so I can make big batches of food all at once & freeze all at once. Super easy to pop out the freezer cubes & pretty easy to clean. Our freezer is split down the middle so the small square is also perfect. I end up making other things with the trays like ice cubes & homemade popsicles for my older child. 1000x better than using a cheap plastic ice cube tray.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell--I regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers here, I found a strong terrible chemical smell to this tray. I will not be using it at all. I suggest you do not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them to make baby food. The flexibility of the silicone helps the cubes pop out easily once frozen. They are a good portion size. Extremely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Must have for making your own baby food
customer_reviews.text: I love this NUK freezer tray. I am glad I decided to make my own baby food this time around. It saves SOOO much money. The serving size is perfect for little ones and if my daughter wants more we just pop out another cube. It makes it easy to transport food to the babysitter or when the baby stays with the grandparents for the weekend. It is easy to clean and does not take up a lot space in the freezer. This is a must have for parents who make their own baby food.
customer_reviews.author: JDarden

customer_reviews.title: Clings to smells
customer_reviews.text: I put bananas in it one and it smelled so bad I had to throw it away. I washed it over and over in the hottest setting my sink goes to and it still smells, which is sad bc I loved the portion sizes.
customer_reviews.author: urmom919

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love these to make baby's food. Top snaps on, it's easy to remove cubes. And makes large cubes for single feeding depending on how much baby eats
customer_reviews.author: Duryion Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Instant pot use - especially nice for eggs
customer_reviews.text: Instant pot use - especially nice for eggs. Once cooked, they make funky deviled eggs that sit nicely on a plate or tray and don't slide or tip.
customer_reviews.author: GmaZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making/freezing baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I make my own baby food and was looking for something to freeze it in, got this on a lighting deal and I love it! Perfect portion size too. The frozen baby food cubes pop right out into a freezer baggie, then I use it again! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kyndle Voskuil

customer_reviews.title: They do not stain!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have used them a few times now to freeze purees I made for my baby. They have yet to stain and nothing has stuck to them. Once frozen the items pop out of the mold fairly easy. The material is almost like a silicone and you can completely flip it inside out. I do wish it was a bit more sturdy so the lid would fit more secure once on. Im just very careful when moving items from my counter to the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: funny girl

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my baby food making supplies
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good addition to my supplies for homemade baby food. To get the cubes out, I just push from the bottom of each one until it inverts and pops out after running a little water over the bottom. Freeze overnight, and then put the cubes into a labeled Ziploc. Thaw as needed in a small Tupperware or bowl with lid for the next day - super easy and I like that this gives me the option to make single ingredient purees in 1-oz sized cubes and then I can mix and match however I want when thawing them for tasty combinations for my baby to try.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 1 baby meal
customer_reviews.text: Such a convenient way to have individual servings ready for your little one. The unit itself is sturdy enough to hold its shape while freezing yet flexible enough to be able to press each frozen cube out into a larger bag so you can freeze more. It is also dishwasher safe so it makes cleanup a breeze! Great addition to our freezer meal prep containers.
customer_reviews.author: AIM2284

customer_reviews.title: Love these, but I'm not sure about the lids
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but I'm not sure about the lids. I bought some other brands too, OXO I think, and those lids aren't tight fitting either so I think it's just the nature/design of these silicone food freezer trays.... I am just now starting to use them so I'll update the review later, but am just not sure how they'll hold up in the freezer for any amounts of time. I don't want to give my kid freezer burn flavored foods.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product, But smells after being frozen
customer_reviews.text: These trays are great for freezing homemade infant food. Perfectly portioned, and I like the lid. However, they have a TERRIBLE smell to them after being thawed out from the freezer. It honestly smells like vomit, and the only way to remove the smell is to run it through the dishwasher, but my wife would love to use these daily, but can't because we have to wait to run the dishwasher. I would love a whole bunch much, but the price is a bit high to own 6 or 8 of these things.
customer_reviews.author: itsZACyo

customer_reviews.title: These are better than most on the market
customer_reviews.text: These are better than most on the market. I made my son's baby food for awhile and this tray comes with a lid which is a huge help to avoid freezer burn or having to transfer into another container right away. I do recommend still transferring food to a zip lock bag with the date made or another container as even with the lid it can still get freezer burn. This is why four starts instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: These work great to freeze baby food purees. They are definitely bigger than I was expecting - definitely not 1 oz, probably 2 oz. As it turns out, that's better now that baby has figured out eating a little better :)
customer_reviews.author: Morgan D.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for homemade baby as well as for making ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this brand and the JumpTots brand. I prefer the NUK brand. The smaller size is much easier to move to and from the freezer, takes up less space and it is easier to pop the frozen food out. I thought the square shape of the frozen food would make it more difficult to "pop out" but that is not the case! I recommend this for homemade baby as well as for making smoothies! I just used these to freeze a bunch of puréed peaches!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel & Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Portion size is incorrect. Actually 2oz each
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for storing and freezing homemade baby food! However, the package clearly states that there are 9 1oz portions when in fact they are actually a full 2oz each. I’m not sure how they could have been labeled so wrong by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Dearman

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy and convenient to work with.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first try at making baby food for my little one, and these food trays are so easy to use! They are perfectly square which makes the space used in the freezer minimal and easy. The frozen food comes out much easier than my silicone tray that came with my baby bullet. Cleaning them is a breeze too! Too wrack dishwasher safe, and turn on the sanitizing and DONE! I won’t buy another tray with these simple and very affordable NUK trays.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan and Jennifer Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portions, easy to fill, stackable. Only thing to complain about is that the frozen cubes can be hard to pop out but I imagine that to be the case with any tray.
customer_reviews.author: ACDisla

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I wasn't sure how this would work. You do need to loosen up the frozen food with a butter knife. The stuff won't just slide out. The tray works great. Will be buying another one so I can prepare more food at once. The lid fits snugly, but not airtight for long term storage, fyi. The portion sizes are great. Really easy to fill, slim lines separate the individual pockets, so if some puree ends up on the skinny line, it's not a considerable amount. It means you can fill them hastily, and let's face it. Mom's doing this are doing it in haste.
customer_reviews.author: A. Diacogiannis

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I like it that I can make 1 oz baby food for my 6 months old girl who just started solid food and doesn't eat much yet. Some reviewers are saying that it is challenging to pop out the frozen blocks, but it is actually easy if you run the back of the tray under warm water and pop them out.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Poteto

customer_reviews.title: Good size for hungier babies (over 6 months) - I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size for hungier babies (over 6 months) - I like the silicone but don't like that it picked up the scent of my dishwasher detergent and now smells like chemicals (have since switched to seventh generation). I don't think it's transferred to the food (I did a taste test) but I got a hard plastic kind that I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Emily T.

customer_reviews.title: Large cube size
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for baby food. I love the size of each cube as they are definitely bigger than the 1oz size the packaging says it is. There are only nine cubes with is kind of limiting, but because they hold more food, it works. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it can take a little work to pop the food out when you fill all the way to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Minday

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, easy to pop out frozen cubes. I usually pop the cubes out and store them in zip lock bags so i can quickly re-use the tray for the next batch. A tip is not to fill the cubes to the very top, otherwise when purée freezes it may expand and pop the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Joy H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal
customer_reviews.text: After checking on my baby food tray in the freezer I was very disappointed. It wasn’t even in there for 12 hours and it has ice all over the food inside the tray. It must not seal at all.
customer_reviews.author: cortney

customer_reviews.title: Must have for making baby food
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second tray because I love these. I cook, purée, and then freeze several cubes of a food at a time. I then transfer the cubes to freezer baggie, so I can freeze a different fruit or vegetable. I find these stack easily in the freezer, and the cubes remove easily. I don't need to run water on the bottom to loosen the cubes, nor have I had spills in the two months that I've used them
customer_reviews.author: JoJoMama

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I've only used twice but the tray is easy to remove the frozen food from and they are a good size for the jars I have to put baby food in. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe if I want to go that route. The lid is secure enough (clearly states not intended to be spill proof, but great for stacking and protection of the food). Overall very nice product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Much better then other products purchased. Portion is just right for starting out baby on foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes food cubes.
customer_reviews.text: Got our first one from a friend. Bought two more when our son started eating a greater variety of food. Should have got even more. Ah well. Next time. Knocked one star because it might be possible to make it easier to pop the cubes out. But, as it is stacks great in the freezer, and food sometimes needs pried out with a butter knife.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer tray
customer_reviews.text: Great item for making a batch of sauce, freezing it in useful amounts and taking out just what you need. The silicon works really well allowing the frozen item to slide out with just a little help from a butter knife. I've used these for sauces, strawberries and cream, home made hummus and food for my granddaughter. Once removed from the tray the item can be easily stored in zip lock bags. They clean up easily and are ready for any new project you may need them for. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Viewpoint

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to clean and to get the frozen food out of the cube. I was about to make a ton of baby food for my little one using these storage cubes
customer_reviews.author: Monica T Long

customer_reviews.title: Easy to prep for baby food
customer_reviews.text: I like this baby freezer box. It comes with the lid to tightly close avoiding the mess and the freezer smell to the baby food. I used it for the puree food I made. So far, I tried butternut squash and sweet potato. They are easy to be taken out from the freezer box with some force from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well I guess. I gave it three stars though as we didn't really use it much. I think we ended up just making fresh food for my daughter most of the time or going with pouches which are much more convenient. If you are really into making baby food and freezing it, then this certifiably does the job and does it pretty well. The food popped right out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Lid is easy to pop on and off. Even when frozen. Very easy to pop food out of each hole.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to store purée baby foods! The lids do not leak. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t seel.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea however the lid fails to make a proper seel. We find food subject to frost and eventually freezer burn.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are very large cubes, and I like the tray for baby food and milk. The lid does not contact the tops of the reservoirs, and it doesn't seal strongly, so it must remain level until frozen. As for value, I find this a bit pricier than similar products for freezing herbs. Generally, I'm pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: A B Star

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaay easier to get cubes out than a traditional ice cube tray!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have an inherent daycare, so my stuff sees a lot of use. These are way easier to get food cubes out of than ice cube trays and easy to clean. They are a good size too. Each cube is probably about the size of two ice cubes. I have been making baby food for 13 years, I wish I would have found these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I though NUK is from Gerber and also made in Germany. Since I got NUK from departments stores and this products are usually made in Germany or USA. But this one is not.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This works great for freezing baby food
customer_reviews.text: This works great for freezing baby food. I have the baby bullet and make all my baby food. The food pushes right out of these without a problem. The freezer mold that came with my baby bullet is really hard to get the frozen cubes out of but this one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth Morris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pop frozen food out of due to silicone material. Doesn't take up a lot of room in my freezer- definitely like this. Only issue I have is getting the lid off- I have to pry a butter knife under to pop it off. (To others complaining this isn't a seal-tight lid, I freeze the food and then move to a freezer storage bag the next day. This allows me to make more food, which I thought was the point of this product...?) Otherwise this freezes the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Eh, nothing great
customer_reviews.text: This product is alright. The problem I have is that after the food is frozen, you have to push from the bottom to get the cubes out. I end up placing my fingers on the other cubes while trying to pop one out which can make things messy, especially when dealing with fruits that get sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: These weren’t as great as I had expected. I ended up using 1.5 cubes to feed my baby as 1 wasn’t enough. The lid also does not stay on well in the freezer at all. Very easy to remove food and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Savary

customer_reviews.title: Essential when you are making your own baby food!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best freezer cubes out there. I have tried other brands, and some of them were impossible to get the baby food out of once it was frozen, and others were too small in size. These are a perfect individual portion for a baby just starting to eat solids, and as baby gets older 2 cubes is the perfect portion, and I would usually grab one cube in one flavor and one in another for variety.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe and very durable silicone material that is also very easy to pop food cubes out of once frozen
customer_reviews.text: Grest product. Dishwasher safe and very durable silicone material that is also very easy to pop food cubes out of once frozen. Having portions already to go and stick in the microwave has been a great help when feeding my twin boys!
customer_reviews.author: Dana A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product was just as advertised. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Owens

customer_reviews.title: Loved this trays
customer_reviews.text: Loved this trays, I made several veggies trays and then mix and match , easy to clean and to pop the cubes from it
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Frozen contents come out easily!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on believing that the contents would be easy to remove. Low and behold - it was actually quick and painless. If you’re planning on doing baby purees I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for anyone making their own baby food!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for making baby food at home. I make food in batches and freeze them for later use. These trays help you pre-measure 2.5oz per serving, are easy to use, stack, empty and wash. Love these and highly recommend if you're planning to make your own food.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this tray and lid
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality and the food has been easy to pop out once frozen. The lid attaches well and helps firm up the tray. It's also easy to clean. I like the green color too.
customer_reviews.author: maxsmom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Kind of a pain to clean but I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and can be used for more than Baby food
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use. Portions out perfectly. I wish it was bigger. I usually prep more than nine portions at a time. The size is actually nice for popsicles too when my kiddos get older.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F

customer_reviews.title: Freezer burnt food
customer_reviews.text: The lids to this product do not stay on well, therefore the tops of the food become freezer burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good freeze trays for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a few of these to freeze homemade baby food in. They worked well for that application, and we have since started to use them for other things like fruit juice/coffee ice cubes or to store fresh single serve herbs in ice now that the kids are eating solid foods. Easy to clean, durable, stackable. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not 1oz portions
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and clean, top snaps on easily, and food pops out easily as well when frozen. The only issue is that they are NOT 1 oz portions as advertised, closer to 2 oz portions each. I simply fill half way.
customer_reviews.author: ScottMisty

customer_reviews.title: First timer making baby food and absolutely LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!!! I bought these and OXO tot baby frozen cup trays. The OXO is great but you have to put more effort into getting the food out then these. Would def recommend for anyone. Simple and easy to use! Glad I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: JK218

customer_reviews.title: Baby Food Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making fresh baby food & freezing it. Easy to remove “cubes” and put into my deep freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Baby food ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for freezing baby food in portion sizes
customer_reviews.author: Paciencia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pop out, perfect amount for my 5 month old. Just make sure you are not storing them in here as the cap is not airtight, only negatives besides not being airtight is it doesn't hold very much ( only 9 cubes)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this for freezing our baby good. The portions are perfect and it is so easy to pop the frozen cubes right out. Very convenient and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Van Wingerden

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! Purchase this, along with some other things on Amazon, as a baby shower gift. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for homemade baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for making homemade baby food. The only thing that I did read in other comments and found to be true is it is hard to get the frozen food out of the container but that’s only a minor downfall. Otherwise I really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousin for her baby shower. She said she really liked it and used it a lot with her cutie pie baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bellingham Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell of the box
customer_reviews.text: The reason I took off a star is the strong chemical smell of the box, don’t feel very good to use it for my baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Li

customer_reviews.title: Great for OXO 2oz food storage cubes
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They fit perfectly into the Oxo 2oz cubes. Easy to get frozen food out of. And super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Lid won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Lid won't stay on. Such a shame for a brand name item
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: We like this, a little easier to take the cubes ...
customer_reviews.text: We like this, a little easier to take the cubes out of here vs an ice tray. I like that it has the lid with it. At first seems smaller bc of only 9 holes but the cubes hold way more than it looks!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome! it's really easy to get the food out ...
customer_reviews.text: I researched silicone food trays for awhile and ordered these. They are awesome! it's really easy to get the food out after it's been frozen. I just wish the lid clicked on better for a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to freeze homemade baby food. It works great, and I am surprised by some reviews that said they had trouble with the food getting stuck... I didn't even had to run it under warm water, it was very easy to get the frozen food out, one cube at the time. I just wished they had other colors to chose from, and I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: I really love these. I was debating about buying these or ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. I was debating about buying these or some other glass Weck jars for storing baby food. This is definitely the way to go. Easy to fill. Easy to pop the cube out. Easy to clean. Great amount of food in each segment. Love it. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Emily SW

customer_reviews.title: It is much easier to remove the food from this ...
customer_reviews.text: It is much easier to remove the food from this silicone tray. When I was using an ice cube tray I had to pry the cubes out with a butter knife, scraping the plastic sides of the tray into the baby food. Now I just pop the cubes right out.
customer_reviews.author: BJM

product_meta.title: NUK Homemade Baby Food Flexible Freezer Tray and Lid Set
product_meta.description:
Size:1 PieceThe NUK Flexible Freezer Tray provides a quick and easy way to make nutritious homemade food for your baby. Use the Flexible Freezer Tray to freeze and store the perfect portions of your homemade baby food. Healthy and nutritious is now quick and easy, too! This tray stores (9) 1-ounce portions of baby food and includes a lid for easy storage. Freezer-safe, dishwasher-safe and BPA-free. The NUK family of brands designs safe and fun products that encourage your baby's development. NUK is committed to nurturing your children's healthy transitions from birth to toddler and has worked for over 50 years to design high quality, innovative products that are scientifically proven to support safe and healthy development.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This small Food Cube Tray is perfect for freezing small portions of your baby's food. By preparing food in batches and freezing it in the food cube tray, you need to only cook once or twice a week.
feature_bullets: Freeze and store your freshly prepared baby food
Flexible, silicone tray makes it easy to pop out each portion
